references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational model for image segmentation, which is used in this paper for instance trajectory estimation.

references.paper_title: Tapir: Tracking any point with per-frame initialization and temporal refinement
references.reason: This paper introduces a point tracking model which serves as one of the baselines for comparison in the current paper.

references.paper_title: The 2017 davis challenge on video object segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark dataset for video object segmentation, used for evaluating the performance of the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Tap-vid: A benchmark for tracking any point in a video
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark dataset for point tracking, used for evaluating the performance of the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Cotracker: It is better to track together
references.reason: This paper introduces a point tracking model which serves as one of the baselines for comparison in the current paper.
